en_text: 8x ATK and 2x HP when all cards are from Monster Hunter Collab

jp_skill.name: 攻撃力UP【大】
jp_skill.raw_description: チームのサブをモンスターハンターコラボキャラのみで組むと、 HPが2倍、攻撃力は8倍。

kr_skill.name: 공격력UP[대]
kr_skill.raw_description: 팀의 서브를 몬스터헌터 콜라보 캐릭터로만 구성하면 HP가 2배, 공격력은 8배

na_skill.name: Attack Up (L)
na_skill.raw_description: 2x HP & 8x ATK when all sub-monsters are from Monster Hunter Collab
